about_the_game:
You’ve added voices to your game’s rural towns and villages to help them feel lived in, but what about the noble’s mansions and royal castle? Well, it’s time to give those areas some voices of their own with the NPC Female Nobles Vol.1 pack! TK.Projects is back with another Japanese voice pack, this time offering 120 SEs to help your noblewomen speak out.

Features:

* 120 different phrases and sayings
* 12 characters, 10 SE per character
* ogg and m4a file formats included

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
